top_level:VBOX app_title_group_box settings_strip app_main_panel app_footer

app_title_layout:HBOX <> gui_title <>

gui_title:QLabel Nonsense__GUI

app_footer:QLabel App__Footer

source_row:HBOX source_grouping source_rhs_buttons
source_grouping:VBOX source_settings progress_slider
source_settings:HBOX source_summary source_refresh_btns
source_summary:QLabel Source__Summary
refresh_and_menu_btns:QLabel Refresh__Etc.
display_row:QLabel Row
